name: Petrichor: Time Attack!
description:
Petrichor is a cyberpunk-survival shooter set in Neo-Kowloon City. You follow the journey of members of the Saito Initiative, trying to figure out the cause of the Tech Infection.

Beat your high-score and fight hordes of Blighted while maintaining your time!

+Completely offline shooter!
+Gamepad Support
+Intuitive Touchscreen controls!
+Third-Person-Shooter
+Console-quality gameplay experience!
+Original cyberpunk-hip-hop soundtrack!
+No advertisements, nor micro-transactions.

Diverse cast of characters with free updates and stages to come!
-------
Current characters
-------
-Langlee
-Elizabeth
-Hector
-Maria
-Sybil

-------
Current stages
-------
-Saito Laboratories
-Alice Project
-Shooting Range
-High-Rise Office
